title: How to Log in to Xbox Live: Quick & Easy Tutorial

steps.title: Turn on your Xbox One console.
steps.content: Turn on your Xbox One console. Press the button that's on the front right side of the console if you have it sitting horizontally. Alternatively, you can press and hold the circular button on the Xbox One remote to start the console.

steps.title: Press the Xbox button on your controller.
steps.content: Press the Xbox button on your controller. It's the circular button you pushed to turn on your console. If you aren't signed in, you should see a prompt at the top of your screen that tells you to press the Xbox button to sign in.

steps.title: Select your profile or select Add new.
steps.content: Select your profile or select Add new . If you've signed into that Xbox before, you'll see your avatar profile picture here. If not, you'll need to add your account.

steps.title: Enter your email, phone, or Skype number associated with your Xbox LIVE account.
steps.content: Enter your email, phone, or Skype number associated with your Xbox LIVE account. Using the directional pad or thumbsticks, you can select letters and numbers on the on-screen keyboard. Press the ☰ key on your controller to continue.

steps.title: Enter your Xbox LIVE password.
steps.content: Enter your Xbox LIVE password. Using the directional pad or thumbsticks, you can select letters and numbers on the on-screen keyboard. Press the ☰ key on your controller to continue.

steps.title: Choose a sign-in and security preference.
steps.content: Choose a sign-in and security preference. If you have a Kinect, you can use visual recognition to sign in and confirm any payments or settings changes. Press A to make your selection.

steps.title: Confirm it's you in front of the Kinect (if you have a Kinect).
steps.content: Confirm it's you in front of the Kinect (if you have a Kinect). If you don't have a Kinect, you couldn't choose the first two options in the previous step and can skip this step. Press A to continue.

steps.title: Choose if you want to use Cortana.
steps.content: Choose if you want to use Cortana. Cortana lets you interact with your Xbox with your voice. You can ask Cortana to start a game and that game will launch, without you having to touch the controller. Press A to continue.

steps.title: Continue to follow the on-screen steps if you want to use a 14-day free trial of Game Pass.
steps.content: Continue to follow the on-screen steps if you want to use a 14-day free trial of Game Pass. Game Pass is a monthly subscription that gives you access to different games each month. Press A to make your selection. You'll be returned to the Home screen and will be signed in to your Xbox LIVE account.

steps.title: Turn on your Xbox 360.
steps.content: Turn on your Xbox 360. You can do so by pressing the circular button on the right side of the console, or you can press and hold the "Xbox" button in the center of a connected controller.

steps.title: Press the Xbox button on your controller.
steps.content: Press the Xbox button on your controller. This is the large, circular X button in the middle of your controller. The mini-guide will open.

steps.title: Select Sign In and press A.
steps.content: Select Sign In and press A . You'll see a list of all the profiles associated with this Xbox 360. If you have signed in before on this Xbox 360, you can find your profile in this list and sign in with your passcode (then skip the rest of this method).

steps.title: Select Download Profile and press A.
steps.content: Select Download Profile and press A . A new window will pop up.

steps.title: Enter your Microsoft account email for the profile you want to download.
steps.content: Enter your Microsoft account email for the profile you want to download. You can visit https://xbox.com/forgot if you don't remember the email address associated with your account. Press the "Done" button (looks like an arrow in a circle) to continue.

steps.title: Enter your password.
steps.content: Enter your password. Press the "Done" button to continue.

steps.title: Select a drive to save your profile on.
steps.content: Select a drive to save your profile on. If the Xbox 360 you are using has more storage space than the default hard drive, you'll need to select where you want to keep your account information. If it doesn't have extra space, you can skip this step. Downloading your profile can take a few seconds or minutes, depending on your connection speed and the size of the download.

steps.title: Go to Sign In and press A.
steps.content: Go to Sign In and press A . After the profile completes downloading, you'll need to sign in to continue. You can press A to check the box next to "Remember Password" if you want to sign in quickly later. Sign in using the same information from the previous step.
